UI_lib

前端UI库，主要包括：代码规范、常用插件、样式框架、字体。

#UI地址 http://yuanhongb.github.io/UI_lib/index.html

#代码规范 http://yuanhongb.github.io/UI_lib/frontend/html/wrapper.html#code_guide

<!doctype html>
    <html>
    <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8"/>
    <title>Marked in the browser</title>
    <script src="lib/marked.js"></script>
    </head>
    <body>
    <div id="content"></div>
    <script>
    document.getElementById('content').innerHTML =
    marked('# Marked in browser\n\nRendered by **marked**.');
    </script>
    </body>
    </html>
